Russia, early 10th century. The reign of Grand Prince Vladimir of Kiev is composed of several principalities ruled by the sons and is the monarch . The princes of each location and their armies gather taxes and send everything to the father , which governs all of the capital Kiev , whose economic base the slave trade . In the northeast of the country is the city of Rostov , a place full of difficult geographic and access difficulties . To dominate the region , Vladimir sends his son Yaroslav , only 11 years old. Over the years, the boy grows up and becomes a true conqueror, having extended the domain of his father and Rostov kept under control . When a barbarian invasion begins , Yaroslav have to use all his fighting skill to prevent the kingdom from collapsing.
